places_with_reviews.name: Dew Dale Resorts, Baratang Island
address: Sundergarh Village Baratang Island, Andaman and Nicobar Islands 744210, India

reviews.text:
Stayed at this quiet hotel away from the city bustle. Both the manager and staff were super nice and went out of their way to help. The food was yummy too!
However when the power went out in the area, they were slow to get their generator going, and we had to keep calling them. No food delivery to the room, which was a bummer.
Still, it's a good place if you want some peace and quiet.

This resort at Baratang is placed at such an awesome spot, far from the crowd and surrounded by greeneries. Loved this place. My little one said it was the best place we have stayed in Baratang. Baratang of Andaman is actually a remote area, where one have very limited options to put up, but we were happy and satisfied to have managed a cottage in Dew Dale. The staffs were very cordial and helpful. The foods were served fresh and hot. We stayed for a night in Dew Dale. I would highly recommend this resort at Baratang to my friends and family.

We saw this property on Internet. Baratang people don’t stay there and make day visit. But we stayed at Dew Dale. It was the best decision as we were mesmerised with the pristine nature it offers. Limestone caves, parrot island were simply awesome. The owner Jessy is such a warm person who made our stay thoroughly pleasant. We thank entire Dew Dale team.

Dew Dale resorts was like an oasis of calm within the wilderness of Baratang. Mrs. Jessy our host is an amazing person and took great care of us. The location was great and very quiet. The food was amazing as well. The aloo parathas especially were just like home.

Amazing experience at Dew Dale Resorts.  Mrs Jessy Madam and her teams politeness, receptions, rooms and food are exceptionally good.  The staff Mr Hari Prasad and Pradeep are so kind and helpful always.  Hope to visit again the same resorts when we go next time.

places_with_reviews.name: OYO 61587 Coral Creek Resort
address: 1 Baratang, Great Trunk Rd, Port Blair, Andaman and Nicobar Islands 744210, India

reviews.text: This is the only good Resort in Baratang and they provide high speed Wi-Fi. If you're planning to visit Mayabunder and Diglipur, this is a great place to spend the night. The food is costly but it's alright if the isolation and transportation is taken into consideration.
Pretty neat place to stay given how isolated Baratang is. The rooms are nice and the food is delicious. Service is good. Beautiful countryside setting as well.

The location is in the country side. I think it is the best place to stay when you are in Baratanga as there are only two hotels in the area and this is the best one.
The food here is good and atmosphere is very calm. You will get a complete feeling of living in the village.

Please take due note that only Airtel and BSNL cards are working there and there is not coverage for Jio SIM cards.

A very clean and beautiful place with all essential amenities for staying in the middle andaman.

The staff is very friendly. The food was good. We will definitely recommend this resort if there is plan to stay in Baratang.

A small resort with neat and clean rooms.  Wifi, hotwater, restaurant facilities are available. The restaurant prices are very high, a coffee costing Rs 60!
Visit my YouTube channel Life Travel Vlogs for videos.

places_with_reviews.name: Andaman Coral Creek
address: south creek baratang, Andaman and Nicobar Islands 744210, India
